mean_en: an idea, a feeling or an opinion that you get about somebody/something, or that somebody/something gives you; the effect that an experience or a person has on somebody/something
sentence: He left a good impression on the interviewer.
sentence_trans: 他给这位面试官留下了好印象。
word_etyma: impress给人印象 + ion名词后缀 → impression印象，影响
